Info for Salvation (Deluxe Version) (2023 Remaster)


"Salvation," released on September 1, 1997, marked ALPHAVILLE's fifth studio album and signaled a new phase in their musical journey, as it was the first ALPHAVILLE album without Ricky Echolette and the last to feature Bernhard Lloyd, who left the band in 2003. The album spawned the singles "Wishful Thinking" and "Flame."

"Salvation" (Deluxe Edition) will be released as a triple Deluxe Version containing the original album (remastered), 16 singles and remixes and 17 demos and remixes.

Marian Gold says about "Salvation": "As far as redemption/salvation is concerned, it seems to me to be a rather tricky idea, which is supposed to somehow overcome nothingness, this dreadful, unacceptable thing. Therein lies its fascination. Where there is darkness, ignorance, distance or death, that's where our desire for redemption is kindled. I think it is stupid to say that our tiny, limited life is just a moment in the eternal. It's the other way around, the eternal is in our tiny, limited life! I don't know how it fits in there."

Bernhard Lloyd adds: "'Salvation', I love this album, could easily have been the second Alphaville album from my point of view. It seems to me today, as it did back then, as if it was all of a piece. 12 songs that fit together, that have their own style, their own sound aesthetic. Without any major external influences, created in the seclusion of a perceived enclave and then produced with Andy Richards in the Mecca of pop music, London.

Alphaville

Digitally remastered

Please Note: We offer this album in its native sampling rate of 44.1 kHz, 24-bit. The provided 96 kHz version was up-sampled and offers no audible value!

Info for Prostitute (Deluxe Version) (2023 Remaster)


The Prostitute (Deluxe Version 2023 Remaster) album by Alphaville is a must-have for fans of the iconic synth-pop band. Released by Warner Music International, this deluxe version features remastered tracks that bring new life to the timeless classics.

With a total of 15 tracks, this album takes listeners on a journey through Alphaville's signature sound. From the catchy hooks of "Forever Young" to the introspective lyrics of "Big in Japan," each song showcases the band's unique blend of electronic beats and heartfelt melodies.

The remastered versions on this deluxe edition breathe fresh energy into these beloved songs. The enhanced audio quality allows fans to fully immerse themselves in Alphaville's music, hearing every intricate detail and nuance like never before.

In addition to the original album tracks, this deluxe version also includes bonus material that will delight long-time fans. Exclusive remixes and previously unreleased demos offer a glimpse into the creative process behind Alphaville's music, giving listeners a deeper appreciation for their artistry.

Whether you're a dedicated fan or new to Alphaville's music, the Prostitute (Deluxe Version 2023 Remaster) album is an essential addition to your collection. Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Alphaville and experience their iconic songs in a whole new way.

Alphaville

Digitally remastered
